item.title: Sub Goal: Wild Caught Fisheries
item.description: AN IMPORTANT GLOBAL FOOD SOURCE This goal assesses our ability to sustainably maximize wild-caught fisheries. CURRENT SCORE [Put a circle with Global Goal Score, like here: http://www.oceanhealthindex.org/methodology/goals/food-provision] The current score indicates that most regions are significantly below their sustainable target values. Many regions are jeopardizing future catch with overharvesting, while a few are not producing as much wild-caught seafood as they could. item.title: Sub-Goal: Mariculture
item.description: AN INCREASINGLY IMPORTANT SOURCE OF FOOD This goal assesses our ability to sustainably maximize the production of farm-raised marine food.
